reporter_caption.center: SALES CO. v. CREDIT CORP., 118 Colo. 331 (1948)

caption.center: AUTO SALES COMPANY v. GENERAL CREDIT CORPORATION.

opinion.posture: An action in replevin by a mortgagee to obtain possession of an automobile, or for judgment for its value. The trial court ruled in favor of plaintiff.
opinion.opinion_text: Judgment affirmed en banc without written opinion, MR. JUSTICE ALTER not participating.

posture.italic: Error to the District Court of Otero County,

Mr. LAWRENCE THULEMEYER, for plaintiff in error.
